item.title: Ã¥ngstromCTF 2019
item.description:
Reversing: One Bite [40pts] Challenge binary takes input from the user; performs single byte xor with 0x3c key and then compares with the hardcoded string. Let’s verify it with ltrace: ~> ltrace ./one_bite __libc_start_main(0x4006a6, 1, 0x7ffe30270b48, 0x400780 <unfinished ...> puts("Give me a flag to eat: "Give me a flag to eat: ) = 24 fgets(aaaa "aaaa
", 34, 0x7efe4674b8e0) = 0x7ffe30270a20 strlen("aaaa
") = 5 strlen("]aaa
") = 5 strlen("]]aa
") = 5 strlen("]]]a
") = 5 strlen("]]]]
") = 5 strlen("]]]]6") = 5 strcmp("]]]]6", "]_HZGUcHTURWcUQc[SUR[cHSc^YcOU_W".
